examples.text: The gallery features several portraits painted by George <w>Romney</w>.
Senator <w>Romney</w> announced his decision to the press yesterday.

senses.sense_definition: A town or city in the United States, such as the county seat of Hampshire County, West Virginia.

examples.text: We stopped in <w>Romney</w> to refuel before continuing our road trip.
The small community of <w>Romney</w> has a rich local history.

senses.sense_definition: A breed of sheep with long wool, originally from the Romney Marsh area in England.

examples.text: The farmer keeps a flock of <w>Romneys</w> primarily for their heavy fleece.
Because they are hardy in wet climates, <w>Romneys</w> are popular in New Zealand.

senses.sense_definition: An alternative form of <w>rumney</w> (a type of sweet wine).

examples.text: The medieval feast included casks of malmsey and <w>romney</w>.
He poured a glass of sweet <w>romney</w> for his guest.
